name: MCDU WT CJ4
description: MCDU Web application for the Working Title CJ4
summary:
This project contains an application that will allow you to access the MCDU of the Working Title CJ4 from a web browser on a tablet or another PC.

In addition to this application, it includes a Flight Simulator mod that will connect the CJ4 to this application.

This mod might requires a specific version of the CJ4, please check the github repo.
